channel.title: How do I make the animations stop going after an object is done?
channel.description:
How do I make the animations stop going after an object is done? Like you will keep doing the animation until you logout, So how do I fix this?
Im trying to make it work when you click an object you do an animation, but you keep doing it. How do I make it so you only do it one time?
How can I make emotes only show one time instead of it going and going and going.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2007, 02:47:13 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone know how?

item.title: How do I make the animations stop going after an object is done?
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Do not bump your thread, this is your last warning.

Read full topic
